document.full_text: anibal sanchez narrowly missed his second career no-hitter as he drove the florida marlins to a 4-1 win over the colorado rockies friday.
document.title: sanchez misses no-hitter against rockies
lines_and_colors: anibal sanchez narrowly missed his second career no-hitter as he drove the florida marlins to a 4-1 win over the colorado rockies friday.
